summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5126 for the improvement of 48th Avenue Southwest and same produced, from West Alaska Street to West Dawson Street, by the construction of watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 59091, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
